languages.text:
The Signet of the Inquisition provides special powers:
-<indent=5%>Grants +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from the wearer and their allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the wearer and their allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Перстень Инквизиции предоставляет особые привилегии:
-<indent=5%>Дает 20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Снимает {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} с персонажа и его союзников в радиусе 5 клеток.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Дает {uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} персонажу и его союзникам в радиусе 5 клеток.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from the wearer and their allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>

The Signet of the Inquisition grants special privileges:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +20.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>

The Signet of the Inquisition grants special privileges:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Momentum{/g} increases by +20.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects are removed from all allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>
-<indent=5%>All allies in a 5-cell radius gain +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
审判庭的图章拥有特殊的力量：
- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}提高20点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除装备者与5格内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>装备者与5格所有盟友获得+{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707}临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。</indent>

- <indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}提高20点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除装备者与5格内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>装备者与5格所有盟友获得+{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707}临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。</indent>

审判庭的印记会赐予以下效果：
- <indent=5%>+20{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。</indent>
- <indent=5%>移除5格内所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。</indent>
- <indent=5%>5格内所有盟友获得{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707}点临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}。</indent>

languages.text:
異端審問庁の印章は特別な力を付与する：
・<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+20増加する。</indent>
・<indent=5%>使用者と使用者の半径5セル内にいる味方から{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を取り除く。</indent>
・<indent=5%>使用者と使用者の半径5セル内にいる味方に、一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を+{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707}付与する。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Signet of the Inquisition provides special powers:
-<indent=5%>Grants +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Removes {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} from the wearer and their allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the wearer and their allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
異端審問庁の印章は特別な力を付与する：
・<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}が+20増加する。</indent>
・<indent=5%>使用者と使用者の半径5セル内にいる味方から{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を取り除く。</indent>
・<indent=5%>使用者と使用者の半径5セル内にいる味方に、一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}への耐久力を+{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707}付与する。</indent>

異端審問庁の印章指輪が次の特別な力を与える：
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}+20。</indent>
-<indent=5%>半径5マス以内にいる味方全員の{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}の効果を解除。</indent>
-<indent=5%>半径5マス以内にいる味方全員が+{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707}の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}を獲得する。</indent>

languages.text:
Das Siegel der Inquisition gewährt spezielle Kräfte:
-<indent=5%>Gewährt +20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Befreit den Träger und Verbündete in einem Radius von 5 Feldern von {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Gewährt dem Träger und Verbündeten in einem Radius von 5 Feldern +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.</indent>
languages.original_text:

-<indent=5%>Grants +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} to the wearer and their allies in a 5-cell radius.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Gewährt dem Träger und Verbündeten in einem Radius von 5 Feldern +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.</indent>

Das Siegel der Inquisition gewährt spezielle Privilegien:
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} wird um +20 erhöht.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxin{/g} werden von allen Verbündeten in einem 5-Felder-Radius entfernt.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Alle Verbündeten in einem 5-Felder-Radius erhalten +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère des pouvoirs spéciaux :
-<indent=5%>Confère +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Dissipe tous les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} affectant l'utilisateur et ses alliés dans un rayon de 5 cases.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Confère +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires à l'utilisateur et à ses alliés dans un rayon de 5 cases.</indent>

La chevalière de l'Inquisition confère des privilèges spéciaux :
-<indent=5%>+20 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}</indent>
-<indent=5%>Les effets {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} sont supprimés sur tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 5 cases.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 5 cases bénéficient de +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.</indent>

languages.text:
El sello de la Inquisición proporciona efectos especiales:
-<indent=5%>Otorga +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Elimina {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} del portador y sus aliados en un radio de 5 casillas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Otorga +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales al portador y a sus aliados en un radio de 5 casillas.</indent>

El sello de la Inquisición proporciona privilegios especiales:
-<indent=5%>Aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} en +20.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Elimina los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} de todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Todos los aliados en un radio de 5 casillas ganan +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.</indent>

-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}</indent>

-<indent=5%>Все союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillPersuasion}Убеждение{/g} персонажа / 7)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g}</indent>

-<indent=5%>Все союзники в радиусе 5 клеток получают +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
Engizisyon'un Mührü, özel güçler sağlar:
-<indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazandırır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Takan kişi ve 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan dost birimlerinin üzerindeki {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkilerini ortadan kaldırır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Takan kişiye ve 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm dost birimlerine +{uip|THP|247acd284cc1404486546f6044576707} geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kazandırır.</indent>
